North_Little_Rock.Augustus Garland House: The Augustus Garland House is a historic house at 1404 Scott Street in Little Rock, Arkansas. It is a two-story wood frame structure, with a truncated hip roof, weatherboard siding, and brick foundation. It has an elaborately decorated two-story front porch, featuring bracketed square columns, low jigsawn balustrades, and a modillioned and dentillated cornice.
